Al Teatro

El Cuidado de las Hadas
Depredación

Las hadas protegen a nuestros empleados.
Todo será pacífico mientras estés bajo el cuidado de las hadas.

Su estómago y su cara fueron arrancadas, y sus ojos y sus órganos fueron dañados como si algo los hubiera comido.
 Mientras tanto, las hadas tenían la sangre y la carne de alguien untadas por toda la boca.
Completar la dificultad Fácil para Desbloquear
Fácil
Difícil

Completa todas las Misiones en ambas dificultades

Suprime al the Festival de las Hadas en las dificultades 'Fácil' y 'Difícil' y completa las misiones.

Consigue varias recompensas tras completar estas misiones.

La 3ra Noche del Walpurgis - En un Libro de una Cierta Biblioteca
La 3ra Noche del Walpurgis - En un Libro de una Cierta Biblioteca
[La 3ra Noche del Walpurgis - En un Libro de una Cierta Biblioteca] unlocks regardless of your progress in the Main Story. Enter via the event banner on the Window or the Driverside tabs.
Event Period

The duration of La 3ra Noche del Walpurgis - En un Libro de una Cierta Biblioteca event is shown here. During the event, complete Missions for Easy and Hard difficulty event Encounters and claim their rewards.
Easy Difficulty Encounter

Select the door to begin the Easy difficulty Encounter.
The Encounter consumes an Enkephalin Module upon entry.
On Easy difficulty, any Deployed Identities under Level 45 will be raised to Level 45.
Also, any Deployed Identities under Tier 3 Uptie Level will be raised to Tier 3 Uptie Level.
However, your current E.G.O Threadspinning Tiers will be reflected.
Hard Difficulty Encounter

Clearing the Easy difficulty Encounter unlocks the Hard difficulty.
In Hard difficulty, your Identities' current Levels, Uptie Tiers, and E.G.O Threadspinning Tiers will be reflected.
Librarian of History Effect

The #1 Sinner to be Deployed in the Teams menu will be imbued with the 'Librarian of History' effect. The effects of 'Librarian of History' differs between Easy/Hard difficulties. Sinner imbued with this effect will gain more Slots and various other beneficial effects.
Missions
You can enter the [Missions] page, where you can view the list of Missions to be completed during the Encounter and their rewards.
You can view the Reward Exchange period in the [Missions] page.
Easy difficulty and Hard difficulty each has different sets of Missions to complete.
Complete these Missions and claim various rewards from the [Missions] page.

Even after the event fully ends, you will be able to experience the 'La 3ra Noche del Walpurgis - En un Libro de una Cierta Biblioteca' combat Encounters and view its story anytime at the Driverside and Theater - [Detour Tales].
